name: NOSTOPHOBIA
description:
A simple 2D game, about a girl who visits her old home where she used to live when she was just a child, haunted by some of her nightmares. Her nostalgia brings her back  to the house after years, where she is ready to explore and fight her nightmares.

Controls : -

AD - Left/Right Movement

Right Mouse Click - Attack

A game by : -

sukime - Designer, Programmer

GrowMinmo - Artist

Sruti Chekka - Artist

hamburger - Artist

Sangoro2 - Artist

thunderbird007 - Programmer

fall - Programmer

Thanks  for playing : )
